attributes.action: More officers patroling and protecting the animals around and in the pond.
attributes.additional_details: I keep seeing dead birds in the pond and by the pond and some of these are babies this is heartbreaking. I have witnessed people dumping beer cans, crisp wrappers, bottles and even a bike on the pond. I have also witnessed school kids throwing and shouting at the animals. Something needs to be done.
attributes.background: I keep seeing dead birds in the pond and by the pond and some of these are babies this is heartbreaking. I have witnessed people dumping beer cans, crisp wrappers, bottles and even a bike on the pond. I have also witnessed school kids throwing and shouting at the animals. Something needs to be done.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
